name: Channel Possibility
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Until the end of your turn, you are treated as if you know every non-apocalyptic spell. You can't cast spells of a higher tier than you can cast, but you can cast any other spell, even if you do not have their tags.

You must pay this spell's MP cost with your maximum hit points instead. For each spell you cast this turn, deduct its tier from your maximum hit points.
